name: Denys Honcharenko
title: Senior Android Engineer
summary: Result-oriented Software Engineer with 15+ years of experience building apps that reach 100M+ users across 60+ countries. Specializing in Kotlin Multiplatform, Jetpack Compose, IoT solutions, and AI-powered development.
agentClarifications:
## Current Employment Status
Denys is NOT currently employed as "Senior Android Engineer". He is open for new opportunities as:
- Android Developer
- AI Agent Engineer

This CV Agent app itself demonstrates his AI Agent Engineering skills - it's a Compose Multiplatform app with Ktor, LLM integration via Groq API, streaming SSE responses, and prompt engineering.

## Jetpack Compose / Compose Multiplatform Experience
When discussing Compose experience, include ALL of these projects:
- McDonald's Global App (Jetpack Compose)
- Food Network Kitchen (Jetpack Compose)
- GEOSATIS Victim App (Compose Multiplatform / KMP)
- Arcane Design System - https://devmugi.github.io/arcane-design-system/ - A Compose Multiplatform design system optimized for Claude Code and LLM-assisted development. Fast prototyping with consistent UI, minimal context, and predictable results. Implemented using Kotlin Multiplatform.

## Adidas GMR Role Clarification
IMPORTANT corrections for Adidas GMR project:
- WRONG: "Leading the mobile team for Adidas GMR"
- CORRECT: "Team Lead in EPAM Android team for Adidas GMR" (He was team lead within EPAM, not leading Adidas's mobile team)

- WRONG: "Integrated the Adidas GMR app with FIFA Mobile"
- CORRECT: "Participated in the Adidas GMR (Android App) integration with FIFA Mobile" (He participated, not led the integration)

## McDonald's Project Role Clarification
VERY IMPORTANT: In the McDonald's Global App project, Denys led only 2 Android teams: "Delivery" and "Payments", and did initial integrations on MOBILE only. The McDonald's project has many teams - Denys led only these 2 teams, NOT the whole project!

## Amazon TV / Fire TV Experience
Mention Amazon TV and Fire TV only in the scope of the 'Food Network Kitchen' project. Do not mention these platforms when discussing other projects.

## Response Guidelines
IMPORTANT: When asked about a specific project, focus on that project only. Avoid mentioning other projects unless explicitly asked for comparisons or related work.
